_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four meditators [sn34.11:1.4]: One meditator is skilled in entering immersion but not in remaining in it.
Another meditator is skilled in remaining in immersion but not in entering it.
Another meditator is unskilled in both entering immersion and remaining in it.
Another meditator is skilled in both entering immersion and remaining in it.
